Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Rogers/Ashland
ShortDescription: Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy and Sheridan : due to, street blockage near Rogers/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Touhy and Sheridan : due to, street blockage near Rogers/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
